Package domosaics.ui.io.menureader

Interface Summary
MenuActionManager Interface MenuActionManager defines all needed methods to add and retrieve loaded actions.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMenuAction The abstract class AbstractMenuAction makes it possible to set all Action specific settings for MenuEntrys.
DefaultMenuActionManager Class DefaultMenuActionManager implements MenuActionManager and defines all needed methods to add and retrieve loaded actions.
JMenuBarFactory Class JMenuBarFactory uses MenuReader to parse a xml formatted menu file and by invoking MenuEntry.create(MenuActionManager) it makes the menu bar usable as JMenuBar.
MenuEntry Class MenuEntry represents a JComponent within a JMenu.
MenuReader Class MenuReader defines the methods to load a JMenuBar from a XML formatted file.
 

Enum Summary
MenuEntryType An Enumeration of all possible types for MenuItems which can be created y the menu reader.
 

Exception Summary
CreateActionException Exception which can be thrown during action creation.
MenuParsingException Exception which can be thrown during menu file parsing.
